markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Traveler's Cloak](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1558)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 86</row>

**Price** 7 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L
</row>

**Access** Knights of Lastwall have access to this item.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These cloaks are designed to accommodate long treks through various climates. Traveler's cloaks for hot climates might be bleached white and created from lighter materials, while those intended for cold climates are made of thicker materials and have linings intended to retain heat. While wearing a traveler's cloak for the appropriate type of weather, increase the time it takes to become [fatigued from temperature effects](/Rules.aspx?ID=642) by 2 hours. A traveler's cloak has no effect at extreme or incredible temperatures.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
